modifications.instruction: replace all instances of dog with cat
change the radius of the ear ellipse to 200
change the color of the nose to Pink500
modifications.result_description: a dog with a pink nose

modifications.instruction: add a red triangle shape below the nose
change the color of the eyes to Green400
change the x radius of the body ellipse to 200
modifications.result_description: a dog with a fatter body

modifications.instruction: change the color of the tail to Blue500
modifications.result_description: a dog with a blue tail

modifications.instruction: add a black triangle shape on top of the dog's head
change the color of the face to Yellow500
modifications.result_description: a dog with a yellow face

modifications.instruction: change the radius of the paws circle to 3
